title: Installation issue: libtirpc%nvhpc fails due to -pipe flag in Makefile
body:
Attempting to build libtirpc using nvhpc compilers generates an error due to an unrecognized '-pipe' flag being passed to the
compiler.  This appears to be due to the -pipe flag being hardcoded in some Makefiles.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install libtircp@1.2.6 %nvhpc
...
==> libtirpc: Executing phase: 'build'
==> [2021-07-09-09:59:33.518276] 'make'
make  all-recursive
make[1]: Entering directory '/tmp/devspackswinst/spack-stage/spack-stage-libtirpc-1.2.6-2zmucfzyo6ukrt7qwcn4d6zlkevhibqp/spack-src'
Making all in src
make[2]: Entering directory '/tmp/devspackswinst/spack-stage/spack-stage-libtirpc-1.2.6-2zmucfzyo6ukrt7qwcn4d6zlkevhibqp/spack-src/src'
  CC       libtirpc_la-auth_none.lo
nvc-Error-Unknown switch: -pipe
make[2]: *** [Makefile:660: libtirpc_la-auth_none.lo] Error 1
```

### Information on your system
```console
> spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.1-2429-f5e6c32495
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-rhel8-x86_64
* **Concretizer:** original
```

I am using an manually installed (external to spack) nvhpc@21.5, but I expect the issue should be present with any version
of nvhpc.

### Additional information

No maintainers for libtirpc
@samcmill is the maintainer for nvhpc.

* [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6792509/spack-build-env.txt)
* [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6792510/spack-build-out.txt)
